history.proof: intros. qsimpl time: 1 use: is_lim_Reals. qsimpl time: 1 use: is_lim_Reals_0,is_lim_Reals. qsimpl time: 1 use: is_lim_Reals_0,is_lim_Reals,continuity_pt_filterlim. srun best use: is_lim_ext unfold: ex_lim.

exceptions.exn: In environment f, g : R -> R x : Rbar H : forall y : R, f y = g y H1 : forall (f : R -> R) (x l : R), limit1_in f (fun y : R => y = x -> False) l x -> is_lim f x l H2 : forall (f : R -> R) (x l : R), is_lim f x l -> limit1_in f (fun y : R => y = x -> False) l x x0 : Rbar H3 : is_lim f x x0 Unable to unify "forall eps : R, eps > 0 -> exists alp : R, alp > 0 /\\ (forall x : Base R_met, (fun y : R => y <> ?M2922) x /\\ dist R_met x ?M2922 < alp -> dist R_met (?M2921 x) ?M2923 < eps)" with "exists l : Rbar, is_lim g x l".
The reference l was not found in the current environment.

original: intros Hf Hex Hun. apply is_lim_Reals in Hf. apply is_lim_Reals_0. apply is_lim_seq_continuous with l. - apply continuity_pt_filterlim. + apply Hun. + apply Hex. + apply Hf. - auto.
